name: REMSleep
0:
”Alexa, ask rem sleep how long I should sleep.”
”Alexa, ask rem sleep when to wake up.”
”Alexa, ask rem sleep when I should wake up.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rem sleep
des: Use this skill to find out the optimal time to wake up, based on number of REM sleep cycles.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
